scan_table_check.description: A script include that does not start with "function" or "var" may unintendedly inject symbols into the global scope - which may lead to unintended side-effects when the code is being executed. Script includes whould always contain exectly one function or class definition.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Script include must contain a class or function
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Refactor the code in the script include to be contained either in a function or a class of the same name of the script include itself.
scan_table_check.short_description: Checks if a script include starts with "function" or "var" to avoid globals
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Script include must contain a class or function
